code: import axios from"axios";var key="373f6586b3d8613d31636fadc4170d59";export var getPopular=function getPopular(){return axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=".concat(key,"&language=en-US&page=1"));};export var getMovie=function getMovie(id){return axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"?api_key=").concat(key,"&language=en-US"));};export var getActors=function getActors(id){return axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"/credits?api_key=").concat(key,"&language=en-US"));};export var getReviews=function getReviews(id){return axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"/reviews?api_key=").concat(key,"&language=en-US"));};export var getForQuery=function getForQuery(query){return axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=".concat(key,"&language=en-US&query=").concat(query,"&page=1&include_adult=false"));};
